metadata.title: CVE-2016-10210 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
libyara/lexer.l in YARA 3.5.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a crafted rule that is mishandled in the yy_get_next_buffer function.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-10210` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libyara8 - 3.5.0+dfsg-9
yara - 3.5.0+dfsg-9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: yara package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.0+dfsg-9').
